PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Warehouse No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 4 R Enter Warehouse # or (ALL)
Enter Product No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 15 R Enter a valid product # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField03 6 8 R Enter a valid starting date
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField04 6 8 R Enter a valid ending date
Enter Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 6 R Enter a valid period or (ALL)
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
